comments.body: This constructor lgtm, makes sense to keep `run_uuid` in the constructor so we can still deserialize run data persisted to the FileStore in older versions via `_MlflowObject.from_dictionary` (and  for `run_id` to be optional for the same reason)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@    """

    def __init__(self, run_uuid, experiment_id, name, source_type, source_name,
                 entry_point_name, user_id, status, start_time, end_time, source_version,
                 lifecycle_stage, artifact_uri=None, run_id=None):
